website_summaries.verdict: This video game bundle is a great way for fans to relive the terror of combating leeches, a giant scorpion, and hordes of zombies roaming these classic games.
pros: Includes both Resident Evil and Resident Evil Zero
Experience the origin of the T-virus outbreak
cons: New players may not enjoy the retro “tank” character controls

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointing
customer_reviews.text: Originally wrote a 5 star review when i started playing due to nostalgia factors but getting far into the games it becomes apparent these need a complete remake from the ground up, not just nicer graphics. The fundamental physics/mechanics should not be a "challenge" in a game. Save yourself the headache and frustration, skip this purchase. If you do get it, play on Easy mode and hack it with cheat codes.
customer_reviews.author: cipi

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, Capcom.
customer_reviews.text: Any Resident Evil fan know that this is a good collection. I'm excited to get a chance to play this. Resident Evil 0 was the first RE game I beat and I can't wait to play Resident Evil remastered for the first time! Ol' skool RE. It's one disc but each game installs separately on your hard drive. And it doesn't install like other games I have. So keep that in mind and you can play offline. I haven't played this origins collection yet but if it's remastered and if the disc work. This easily get 5 stars. Thank you, Capcom. I wish those Silent Hill people would remaster those games for present and future consoles. Just saying....
customer_reviews.author: Tute

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite video games EVER.. made better!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED the original Resident Evil. Though I've never been a hard core gamer, I've always enjoyed video games in moderation. This is won of the few games that I could play for hours. My wife and kids got this new HD version for me for Father's Day and I love it! Its still creep and intelligent. I'm sure a lot of people like it for the "killing zombies" aspect but I always liked it most for the problem and puzzle solving aspects, and the storytelling. The first RE was a great game and this is made even better to enjoy of HD TVs. Nicely done! Applauds. LOL
customer_reviews.author: The Narrator

customer_reviews.title: Great Game beware of sellers.
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 on the game itsself. 0/10 on Packaging of used game. 10/10 Amazons quick shipping. 0/10 on Packaging of used game. Again.. 0/10 on Packaging of used game. At least the disc works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My R.E 0 Problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband , he loves Everything RE but the movies. R.E 1 was great. We were highly disappointed in Resident Evil 0. It stops doing story lines ,then turns off the game. So I returned it thinking defective game. The second one come new . Same problem. It not the seller but the game it self. No matter were I'll buy it from. found others have this problem to . He never got a chance to play it just part 1.
customer_reviews.author: Grape

customer_reviews.title: Itchy. Tasty.
customer_reviews.text: Creepy and fun, and one of the best editions of the original game in the Resident Evil series. Haven't played Zero yet but I'm looking forward to it. You can select original "tank controls" or use a more modern controller scheme, right now I'm using the original controls and it's a fun challenge! Capcom did a very good job with these games; they really nailed the presentation with not just the graphics but in creating an ominous atmosphere with great sound design.
customer_reviews.author: LPetal86

customer_reviews.title: You get what you ordered
customer_reviews.text: Game arrived earlier than expected. Perfect condition. Good entertainment. These were some of the last good Resident Evil games, before action started becoming more of a focus (until VII). Much more horror-driven here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A remake done right.
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Only downside is the controls if you're accustomed to the old scheme. High replay factor.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: I recommend buying this product
customer_reviews.text: For the fans of the series Resident Evil, I recommend buying this game that is very enjoyable

customer_reviews.title: Great games! If you're a RE fan this game is a must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Resident evil? Yes, please! I'm still waiting for the Resident Evil 2 remake. But while I wait this will definitely work. I bought it for the Resident Evil 1 remake. If you haven't played any resident evil game, or only played Resident Evil 4, 5, or 6, then this is definitely a must play!

customer_reviews.title: Awesome R.E. ORIGINS Game
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game for xbox and resident evil fans. I've never played the first and prequel games of R.E., now I got to play it the story and characters is interesting and exciting like R.E. Code veronica, 4- 6, Revelations 1-2. Hope capcom remakes/remastered Resident Evil 2, Resident Evil- Nemesis, and Resident Evil 3 for xbox consoles soon.
customer_reviews.author: xArkSlade08x

customer_reviews.title: Good old fashioned resident evil!
customer_reviews.text: If you want good old horror then get this. It is the resident evil games from the GameCube days. Very worth picking up. If your want to fly through levels round house kicking zombies in the face that are carrying machine guns.. then just pickup resident evil 6.

customer_reviews.title: Survival horror at its finest
customer_reviews.text: If you want to play two of the best survival horror games, this is for you!

customer_reviews.title: Still great after all these years!
customer_reviews.text: Classic game and still love RE and RE0! Pretty good price considering you get 2 games in 1 and both take several hours to completely get through. Both games are as creepy as ever and a lot of fun to play.
customer_reviews.author: JTA212

customer_reviews.title: to much waste of time in game play
customer_reviews.text: to much time wasted on out clips with doors opening and closing, going up and down stairs. I feel it ends up a waste of time in the fact you have to back track from one point all the way back to the typewriter in order to save your status only to re-step the path just to go on.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Lahr

customer_reviews.title: I love Resident Evil and have been a fan since beating ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Resident Evil and have been a fan since beating RE2 back in the day (one of my favorite games of all time). I haven't played 0 or RE1 yet so I'm really excited to get into it! The graphics may not be the best but the gameplay with the puzzles and the fright factor makes the game so fun. I can't wait to play these two and I also can't wait for other remasters to be released for the current gen consoles.
customer_reviews.author: Jamboogles

product_meta.title: Resident Evil Origins Collection - Xbox One Standard Edition
product_meta.description: Platform:Xbox OneTwo full HD remastered games!
feature_bullets: Return to the series origins - Discover the truth behind what led to the horrors at the Mansion in Resident Evil in this fan-favorite and popular prequel title to the series.

Completely enhanced visuals - New high-resolution textures have been created from scratch, including 1080p support on next-gen consoles, while still preserving the classic appearance of the original release.

Fan-favorite Resident Evil characters - Rookie S.T.A.R.S. member Rebecca Chambers and wanted criminal Billy Coen combine skills and buddy up to survive the undead and infected nightmares that await them.
All original difficulty levels plus new Very Easy Mode for novice players

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars270 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Pricing: The strikethrough price is the List Price. Savings represents a discount off the List Price.
